job_tasks.phrase: e2e implementeren van POCs / applicaties en oplossingen voor interne & externe stakeholders binnen het domein van (digital) advertising.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the end-to-end implementation of applications and solutions, which is a core software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: Generative AI module - module voor het resizen, in & outpainten van advertentie banners voor adverteerders via integratie met generative AI services
job_tasks.justification: This describes a specific application of generative AI (image manipulation) that likely involves prompt engineering or service integration.

job_tasks.phrase: Ontwikkelen sales/adops chatbot obv email database
job_tasks.justification: Developing a chatbot based on a database is a direct application of generative AI, often involving prompt engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Opzetten speech-to-text followed by text-to-text proces voor het classificeren van audio/video streams
job_tasks.justification: This involves processing and classifying streams using generative AI capabilities, fitting into the GenAI specialization.

job_tasks.phrase: Creatie van advertising prospectie lijsten obv bestaande klantenoverzicht
job_tasks.justification: Creating lists based on existing customer data implies data processing and potentially feature engineering for AI models.

job_tasks.phrase: Creatie van een optimale media planning tool obv historische voorstellen
job_tasks.justification: Creating an optimization tool based on historical data suggests model development or application of ML techniques.

job_tasks.phrase: Highlights en next best actions definiëren obv campagne rapportering
job_tasks.justification: Defining actions based on campaign reporting implies analysis and potentially predictive modeling or recommendation systems.

job_tasks.phrase: Vergelijken van verschillende externe gen AI services (text, image, audio, video) in functie van een objectief
job_tasks.justification: Comparing different GenAI services involves evaluating and potentially selecting or adapting models.

job_tasks.phrase: Evalueren en opzetten van een RAG versus fine tuned LLM
job_tasks.justification: Directly mentions RAG and fine-tuned LLMs, which are core GenAI specialization tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: je bouwt reliable & robuuste interfaces voor andere DPG teams om mee te integreren
job_tasks.justification: Building interfaces for integration is a classic software development and integration task.

job_tasks.phrase: je integreert generative AI APIs op kostenefficiënte en schaalbare wijze
job_tasks.justification: Integrating APIs, especially with a focus on cost-efficiency and scalability, is a software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: je bouwt snelle POCs om bepaalde externe tools te evalueren naar business value
job_tasks.justification: Building Proofs of Concept (POCs) to evaluate tools is part of the development lifecycle.

job_tasks.phrase: you build it, you run it mentaliteit (development & devops, infra-as-code, CICD, …)
job_tasks.justification: This clearly indicates responsibilities related to development, DevOps, IaC, and CI/CD, which fall under MLOps/LLMOps.

job_tasks.phrase: je neemt deel aan standups, refinements, retro's & demo's (2-weekly sprint)
job_tasks.justification: Participation in Scrum ceremonies is a standard software development team activity.

job_tasks.phrase: samen met de PO, project managers en stakeholders ontwikkel je generative AI POCs / modules, zowel standalone projecten als modules binnen bestaande applicaties.
job_tasks.justification: Developing POCs/modules in collaboration with PO, project managers, and stakeholders shows an understanding of business needs and project alignment.

job_tasks.phrase: je interageert met stakeholders om de scope goed uit te spitten en kritische vragen te stellen
job_tasks.justification: Interacting with stakeholders to clarify scope and ask critical questions demonstrates business understanding and requirement gathering.
Evaluating tools based on business value directly relates to understanding and aligning with business strategy.

job_tasks.phrase: je bent zelfstandig en kan zonder veel problemen een webapplicatie opzetten binnen een AWS omgeving
job_tasks.justification: Setting up a web application in an AWS environment is a core software development and deployment task.

job_tasks.phrase: je neemt ownership & accountability voor bepaalde applicaties / modules / processen / ..
job_tasks.justification: Taking ownership and accountability for applications/modules is a clear indicator of innovation and ownership.

soft_skills.phrase: je neemt deel aan standups, refinements, retro's & demo's (2-weekly sprint)
soft_skills.justification: Participation in Scrum ceremonies indicates collaboration within a team.

soft_skills.justification: Interacting with stakeholders to clarify scope and ask critical questions demonstrates business understanding.

profile.rationale: The role involves a significant amount of core software engineering tasks (1.A.1) such as implementing applications, building interfaces, integrating APIs, and DevOps/CICD practices. Simultaneously, it has a strong focus on Generative AI specialization tasks (1.B.1, 1.B.2) including developing chatbots, speech-to-text processes, evaluating GenAI services, and specifically setting up RAG versus fine-tuned LLMs. The blend of robust software engineering with specific GenAI model and application development aligns with the 'Core GenAI Engineer' profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job advertisement is very clear and detailed, explicitly mentioning various Generative AI tasks, software engineering responsibilities, and DevOps practices. The language used directly maps to the categories in the coding book, making the analysis straightforward and highly confident.
